item.title: Exploring Seiryu-en Bonsai Garden in Kyoto
item.description: History: Seiryu-en Bonsai Garden, located in Kyoto, has a rich history dating back to its establishment in 1925. Founded by Houn Ohara, the garden has become a symbol of Kyoto’s cultural heritage, preserving and showcasing exquisite bonsai specimens. Renowned Masters: The garden has been influenced by the expertise of Houn Ohara, who played a pivotal role in shaping its philosophy and design principles. His dedication is reflected in the meticulous care and artistic approach applied to every bonsai within the garden.
